alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Snyder; Southern Lycoming; Union (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 25 at 6:35PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHUMBERLAND...SNYDER... MONTOUR...COLUMBIA...AND LYCOMING COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 634 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Montoursville to Lewisburg to 12 miles south of Mifflinburg. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Milton, Hughesville and Muncy around 640 PM EDT. Northumberland and Sunbury around 645 PM EDT. Lairdsville, Mooresburg and Port Trevorton around 650 PM EDT. Danville, Biggertown and Riverside around 655 PM EDT. Elysburg, Bloomsburg and Urban around 700 PM EDT. Waller, Rebuck and Knoebels Grove around 705 PM EDT. This includes the Bloomsburg Fairgrounds. Other locations impacted by these storms include Edgewood, Turbotville, Lime Ridge, Washingtonville and Orangeville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Snyder; Southern Lycoming; Union
